import React from 'react' import { validarSoloLetras, validarCampo, validarSoloNumeros, validarCedulaInput } from '../scripts/validacion'; import '../styles/registerStyle.css'; import { useState } from 'react'; const FormCliente = (props) => { return (

{props.tituloFormCli}

validarSoloLetras(event)} onInput={(e) => validarCampo(e.target)} onChange={(e) => props.nombreCli[1](e.target.value)} required />
validarSoloLetras(event)} onInput={(e) => validarCampo(e.target)} onChange={(e) => props.apellidoCli[1](e.target.value)} required />
{/*
setFechaNacimiento(e.target.value)} required />
validarSoloNumeros(event)} onInput={(e) => validarCampo(e.target)} onChange={(e) => setCelular(e.target.value)} required />
validarSoloNumeros(e.event)} oninput={(e) => validarCedulaInput(e.target)} onChange={(e) => setCedula(e.target.value)} required />

validarCampo(e.target)} onChange={(e) => setEmail(e.target.value)} required />
validarCampo(e.target)} onChange={(e) => setPassword(e.target.value)} required />
*/}
) } export default FormCliente
